original_title: Kein Vertrauen, keine Angst, um nichts bitten
overview: "No trust. No fear. Ask nothing" traces the seemingly lost world of Russian gangster and prison camp music. Witnesses from the soviet period bring the underground music scene of the '60s and '70s back to life. But is it really a lost world, or why would young hip hop and folk musicians refer to their mythic ancestors?
title: No Trust. No Fear. Ask Nothing.
